reviews.review: The service was amazing. I never had to wait that long for my food. The staff was friendly and attentive, and the delivery was impressively prompt.
Fantastic experience! The food quality was top-notch, and the delivery was super fast. Highly recommended!
The food was okay, but the delivery took longer than expected. I hope they improve this aspect.
The food was delicious, but the delivery was a bit slow. I was a bit disappointed.
Absolutely loved the food! The presentation was perfect, and the flavors were incredible. Will order again for sure.
The food was not as fresh as I expected, and the delivery was late. Quite disappointed with the experience.
Great food and reasonable delivery time. The packaging could have been better though.
